overview: Hattan, a truck driver often delivers goods from the Seremban to Kuala Pilah. Every time he went there, he would ceaselessly stop at one place to watch his ex-lover, Ira. Looking back on the past 20 years ago, Ira married her brother, Zaidi unwillingly. Their marriage failed, and they were blessed with a child named Amir. Hattan was disappointed to take himself to Kuala Lumpur to become a rock singer but failed. The conflict started when he saved Ira and Amir from Zaidi who often interfered in their lives.
title: Dari Kekasih Kepada Kekasih
